title: How do I find my phone using the TalkBand B2?
answer:
If your B2 is connected to your phone and you are not able to locate your phone in your bag or around you - the B2 can help you!

Press and hold the side button on the B2 and swipe to the phone finding screen. Touch the screen to start searching. Your phone will vibrate or beep (ring) when its within range.Â 

Note: This feature requires Android 4.0 or later and iOS 7.0 or later. Huawei Wear application should be installed and synced with the B2.
